unnormalised: Hmm, konnem Bharotantlea sorkari xikxonnik yojneam vixim vicharlem. Mhaka mhozo onubhav vanttun gheunk zata. Mhoji dhaktuli bhoinn, Aisha, "Beti Bachao, Beti Padhao" yoznecho boro faido ghetla. Amchem kuttumb Lucknow laginchim ek lhan ganvant jietat, ani survek, mhojea avoi-bapain tika ek khasgi xallent dhaddpak sonkoch ailo. Fees sumar Rs. 20,000 dor vorsak asli, ji tankam ek vhodd rokkdom asl. Punn, hea yoznek lagon, tankam ₹5000 dor vorsak subsidy mell'lli. Hantuntlean tankam tika borem xikxonn divpak uttejon mell'llem.
normalised: Hmm, konnem Bharotantlea sorkari xikxon yovzneam vixim vicharlem. Mhaka mhozo onnbhov vantt'ta. Mhoji dhaktuli bhoinn Aisha-k "Beti Bachao, Beti Padhao" yovznecho khup faido zalo. Amchem kuttumb Lucknow laginchchea eka lhan ganvant jietta, ani survatek, mojea avoi-bapain taka private xallent dhaddpak tallmell aslo. Fee sumar rupia vis hozar dor vorsak asli, ji tankam vhodd रकम asli. Pun, hea yovzneak lagun, tankam dor vorsak rupia panch hozarachi subsidy mell'lli. Hachea vorvim taka odhik boreantli bori xikxonn divpak tankam ut'tejon mell'llem.

unnormalised: Aisha St. Mary's Schoolant 8vea vorgant xikta ani ti khub bori kortali asa. "Beti Bachao, Beti Padhao" soddun, tika Sarva Shiksha Abhiyanantlean sorkaranchean fukat pustokam mellttat. Mhaka ugddas asa mhojea bapain tichea Aadhaar no. gheun ek form bhorlem mhonn hea khatir. Tem thodem trasachem aslem, punn purem mullyachem. Mhaka dista ti odhik bori xikxeant kortali asa kiteak tika vellacher bori pustokam mell'lli ani dusrea vidhyarthyakoddlean zunni pustokam viktem gheunk amkam vatt pollounk poddli na. Tiche xikxok, khas korun Mrs. Sharma, tika ektra-curricular karyavollint bhag gheunk sodanch uttejon ditat. Tinem soddech ek vigyan spordhent 1lem inam jikhlem!
normalised: Aisha atam St. Mary's School-ant Class eight-ant xikta, ani ti खऱ्या अर्थान bore bhaxen cholta. "Beti Bachao, Beti Padhao" bhair, tika Sarva Shiksha Abhiyanantargot sorkaran dillem pustok-ui fukat mellttat. Mhaka ugddas asa mojea bapain tika A-A-D-H-A-A-R નંબરacho ek form bhorlo. Tem thodem kasttaim aslem, pun पूरीपणे molachem. Mhaka dista ti xikxonant bore bhaxen cholta kiteak tika bori pustok vellacher mell'lli ani dusrea vidhyarthyachi purann pustok vikti ghevpak amkam vat pollovchi poddli na. Tichea xikxokan, खास करून Mistress Sharma, hamesha tika extra-curricular karyakramant bhag gheunk-ui ut'tezit kortat. Tinnem हालिच एका विज्ञान स्पर्धेत पयले इनाम जितलें!

unnormalised: Satponnank, hea yojneam viret, tichem fuddar khub vegllem asunk xokta aslem. Hanv soglleank National Scholarship Portal (NSP) तपासपाक uttejon ditam - thoddim yojneam vibhinn vorgam ani utpon'nachim thoddi thorancher tuka thoim mellttolim. Tamil Naduntlea ek yojneachea bhaxen, ani rajya-thorachim yojneam assat, ji vidhyarthink laptop ditat zankam Class 12 xikxenant 90% voir gunn mellttat. Chukunko naka! Tenkuch Aisha khatir kelem, tache bhaxen tem tuzo jivit bodlunk xokta.
normalised: Khorem mhunnttlear, hea yovzneam viret, tichem bhavitvy khup vegllench asunk xaktem aslem. Hanv soglleank नेशनल स्कॉलरशिप पोर्टल (N-S-P) तपासपाक ut'tezit korta - tumi thoim vegvegllea वर्गां खातीर ani utponnachem पातलें खातीर khup yovzneo mellounnk xaktat. Tamil Nadu-antlea yovznea bhaxen anik राज्याच्यो paatlleo yovzneo-ui asat, ji varga baraंत navad टक्क्यां चड गुण mellovnarea vidhyartheank laptops dita. Chuk naka! Tem tumchem jivit bodolunk xakta, Aisha khatir kele bhaxen.
